Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.HttpEndpointAttribute Class Reference Openlabs.Mgcxm.Net.HttpEndpointAttribute
Represents an attribute used to define an HTTP endpoint.

Represents an attribute used to define an HTTP endpoint.
